评论概述: Just arrived today and I hope it lives up to deserve my five stars
评论详情: Perfect Flattering fit! I love the stripes so the pattern is beautiful. I love the V-neck for comfort and makes you look taller. I will even wear it to the gym with the black yoga pants I bought on Amazon. It’s lovely enough for casual wear. It’s long enough to wear over yoga pants.
Love this shirt! Very light weight and soft. I bought a small and it’s on the large side however it looks adorable tucked in the front and paired with skinny jeans and black booties.

The fabric isn’t great but that wasn’t a deal breaker for me, however, the length was. I wanted to partially tuck it in like in the picture shown, but the shirt is too long by quite a bit so it looked bad. If you want to wear it long over leggings it would be perfect and very cute because it’s notched at the bottom hem near the seam.

评论概述: The fit was great! Very Comfortable material
评论详情: There is nothing I disliked about this shirt
Fits just right.  Love the color.  Price was great
Soft material and fits great !
Little see through

This does not have t-shirt sleeves but gives the appearance of short feminine capped sleeves. Look closely at the photo and you'll see what a great design it is and how incredibly flattering. Keeping the black and white and ordering more colors. I love them
This shirt odds a good value. It’s just as pictured.
Absolutely love the feel of the material ordered several more
Lo recomiendo 100 % la tela  realmente impresionante, el color tal y como muestra en la foto  ,la talla perfecta ,todo acorde a la descripción
Way to big.

I ordered an XL size. I recently lost weight and can now fit a Large. I'm torn as to what would work best with my body.  I carry a pouch under my belly button; but the xl carries too much material on the sides for my liking. If I went down to a L-size, the sides would fit better,  but I'm afraid the material would hug my pouch and show the imprint of my belly button.  It's a nice top. It feels good and soft.  I do think the color is off. I think I ordered a teal;  but I feel there is too much blue in the shade, that I wouldn't say that it is a teal. I think the price is low enough that you can figure what sixes you fit and order different colors.

I really like the flattering style and comfort of this casual top! But it may be worth sizing up a size. Mine fits on the small side in the arms and tummy area, and this top doesn't have much stretch, which wouldn't make it any more comfortable anyway.  The fabric is heavy enough that it's not see-through, yet lightweight enough for comfort. The price of $12.99 at the time I ordered is reasonable, and there were several great color options. I might go back and order more colors, but I will size up!

I ordered this shirt for my wife ((5-4, 185) in a large based on the size chart and the Amazon size recommendation. The shirt fit well in the length and bust but my wife mentioned that the little cap sleeves had a weird fit and she didn’t like that but overall the shirt was well made and had a good fit.

评论概述: Runs small and kind of flimsy
评论详情: This tshirt is ok. It's just an average tshirt. It does feel a little on the flimsy side and not super high quality. It also runs small based on the sizing chart. It also lost some of its softness after I washed it. That was disappointing. It's lightweight so it will be perfect for summer.

I ordered this shirt in a Medium with Pink Stripes.  The shirt fit as expected.  For reference, I am 5'8, 140 lbs, and M is my usual size.  The shirt is made of soft material, and it looks really cute.  It is good quality, especially at this price point.  I would recommend this shirt.

This V-neck knit top is made of T-shirt material, but it has a nice silky feel to the fabric. The XXL fits my body OK although you can see my fat rolls through the shirt. I’m hoping to lose weight and it will look better. The shirt feels really good on. It washed as well.

This is a tasteful shirt.  It appears to be well-constructed.  My only issue is that the material is too thin for my preference.  I never found it appealing to have a shirt that could be seen through, and required a covering over or under.  The fit was impeccable.

评论概述: CUTE, CUTE, CUTE; I LOVE IT!
评论详情: This is a blessing! The shirt is adorable and I love the color too. It fits very well and doesn't cling to every bump. The material will wash wonderfully and not dry full of wrinkles either which is yet another blessing. I can't wait for Spring and Summer because I can't wear this in the rain and that is all we are getting here right now and it is sooo cold.  Looking at the material and the craftsmanship, it is really well made too. Thank you.

What’s more classic than a striped shirt?  I love the look of a striped t shirt and could have one in every color. They always look fresh and timeless. There is no doubt that it will be in style for years to come. This shirt is light and soft. A perfect combination.

This basic T shirt is well made and the material is soft.  It fits true to size and this green color is very nice for spring/summer.  Would also go well under sweaters, etc.  A good layering piece to have in your wardrobe.

Love everything about this shirt. Right length, right fit, great color. The length hits me the same as the model in the picture, but it's also worth noting that I'm short (5'1"), so if you are of average height, it will probably be a little shorter. Fabric is not sheer, but still lightweight. Nice stretch, smooth feel.

I really like the style and color of this shirt.  It is super comfortable and I really like how it fits.  It is pretty good quality and feels nice.  It is easy to get on and off and looks cute.  I am really happy with this shirt and would highly recommend it.

This is a very nicely made, lightweight top.  I am 150/5”6” and ordered a size large.  However this runs big so take that into consideration when ordering.  The fit on this is a bigger, loose fit cut and I plan to get lots of use out of this as a night shirt.  This shirt would be best used as casual wear and I would definitely size down.

评论概述: Nice Material And A Nice Fit
评论详情: Very nice and comfortable. The v neck top fits great. I like the look and also the length of this top. Sizing is on point. The fushia color is bright and vibrant. Made with a nice thick grade material that makes this v neck top the perfect apparel to add to your spring or summer wardrobe.

Indeed, it was a perfect warm weather Tshirt…until I opened it hastily.  This summer-friendly striped shirt is so soft and made of a light weight fabric. The thin fabric invites breezes and helps avoid over-heating.  The style of this Tshirt is quite attractive and I love the V-neckline.  **Regarding the two tiny holes, I did that. This beautiful shirt arrived to me in pristine condition.
The material is light weight and comfortable Fits well Looks nice I really like the peach color

I really like casual shirts that can be worn for basic every day comfort. This shirt is really cute and is a stylish tee. It's soft and fits me just right, the size seems to be true to size and I chose a medium.
Soft, stretchy materials. Very comfortable to wear. A very saturated black color. Perfect fit.
Cute stripe top good classic timeless casual chic
